API Documentation
==================

Welcome to the API documentation. This document outlines all available categories of operations in the FastAPI project, focusing on assets like Battery Packs, Vehicles, SIM Cards, and more.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   battery_pack
   sim_card
   vehicle
   swapping_station
   charger_advanced
   charger_basic
   position_tracker_basic
   position_tracker_advanced
   vehicle_control_unit
   energy_meter
   location
   geofence
   user
   report
